long_description: This variety assortment of 45 sterile adhesive bandages is intended for use on minor cuts and scrapes and is ideal for replenishing first-aid kits. Latex-free bandages are packaged in a clear, zip-close bag for water-resistance. Bandage assortment includes: (24) 0.75 x 3 inch; (11) 1 x 3 inch; (5) 1.5 x 3 inch; 5 fingertip; 5 butterfly.
short_description: This variety assortment of 45 sterile adhesive bandages is intended for use on minor cuts and scrapes and is ideal for replenishing first-aid kits.
